mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT nickname, avatar FROM sys_user WHERE create_time >= #{startTime} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT u.nickname, u.avatar, COUNT(log.id) AS operationCount FROM operation_log log JOIN sys_user u ON log.operator = u.user_id WHERE log.operation_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar ORDER BY operationCount DESC LIMIT #{limit}
